pages.text: The Wisdom Fruit is a new Vault Fruit that doesn't add time to a vault. Instead, it adds a random Hunter modifier, such as Living Hunter, Pylon Hunter, etc.
It also will add a nasty negative to your vault as well! You will be informed of which modifiers you got on consumption. There are no limits to Wisdom Fruit eaten.
You can only obtain the Wisdom Fruit from an $(l)Iskallian Garden$()!
